description:
Extend your runs during the shoulder seasons in a wicking long sleeve tee that won't stick to you. Micro-holes in the fabric keep you sweat-free during high-output runs and workouts.

  • Lightweight AdvancedSkin ActiveDry fabric wicks moisture
  • Mesh fabric throughout
  • Raglan sleeves ensure freedom of movement
  • Reflective hits keep you visible in low light conditions
name: Salomon Cross Run Long Sleeve T-Shirt - Men's
